nodes.text: A male Talz was the father of the Talz warrior Broonmark well before the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. When Broonmark was young, his father was slain by one of the predators on their homeworld of Alzoc III, and Broonmark felt only shame at his elder's weakness.
Broonmark's father was first mentioned in the Codex entry for Broonmark in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
